title: Lola the Llama
description: Llamas are known for being stubborn, and Lola the llama is as stubborn as they come! Lola the Llama provides students with an entertaining text about a stubborn llama and her owner Sofia. Sofia wants to go to the village, but Lola is determined to do the exact opposite. Colorful, lively illustrations and a silly plot will keep readers engaged throughout the story. This text can be used to help teach narrative point of view as well as how to retell text and recognize different types of sentences.
highFrequencyWords: choice, delicious, dragged, opposite, saddled, stubborn
